title: Racist Ads, Gun Buybacks And Why Engineers Should Scare You 10.10.17
itunes:title: Racist Ads, Gun Buybacks And Why Engineers Should Scare You 10.10.17
description:
In episode two, Jack & Miles, along with special guest comedian Jamie Loftus, discuss problematic soap ads, Russian managed YouTube accounts, gun buybacks, gun silencers for millennials, SNL's 'it's a New York thing" excuse & more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
